import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Salaryslip.css' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; function RelievingLetter() { const getCurrentDate = () => { const date = new Date(); const options = { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }; return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', options); }; const currentDate = getCurrentDate(); return (

SAER

Relieving Letter

SAER TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

Date: {currentDate}
Miss/Mr/Mrs Name
Address:

Dear Name,

This is to acknowledge receipt of your resignation letter dated DD-MM-YYYY.
While accepting the same we thank you for the association you had with us during the tenure from DD-MM-YYYY to DD-MM-YYYY.

You have been relieved from your service with effect from the closing working hours of DD-MM-YYYY.
We wish you all the best in your future career.

With Regards,
Yours Sincerely,
Name

Dharma Ram
Director
SAER Technologies Private Limited

P.S for any further clarifications hereafter kindly write to hr@saertechnologies.com

Registered Office: SAER TECHNOLOGIES PVT. LTD. 450, B2, Loknayak Puram, New Delhi, 110041

Office : SAER TECHNOLOGIES PVT. LTD. Shop No-52, Model Town B, Malviya Nagar, Jaipur ,302017

Ph: +91 93126 00755 Email: admin@saertechnologies.com Website: www.saertechnologies.com

CIN: U72900DL2022PTC403443

) } export default RelievingLetter
